title: Growlanser IV ～ Wayfarer of the time ～
original_name: グローランサー IV ～ Wayfarer of the time ～
sinopse:
Manga adaptation of the game's story, abridged into a single volume. As is usually the case with adaptations, the story differs at points from that of the game, but the essential story is told.

(Source: Growlanser Realm)
